wrapScienceJ.metaData.sets

Class BooleanSetSingle

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaDataContainer
      • wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaData
        • wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaDataRetriever
          • wrapScienceJ.metaData.sets.MetaValue
            • wrapScienceJ.metaData.sets.BooleanSetSingle

  • public class BooleanSetSingle
extends MetaValue
    Allows to manage meta data with a single value with type boolean.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BooleanSetSingle

        public BooleanSetSingle(java.lang.String fileNamePostfix,
                        java.lang.String shortDescription,
                        MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy retrievalPolicy)
        Creates a BooleanValueConfig with initial value zero.
        Parameters:
        fileNamePostfix - The short human readable title, used as a postfix in conf files (e.g. for use as dialog box title)
        shortDescription - The short description (key) of the unique attribute to create in the configuration
        retrievalPolicy - The policy to retrieve the parameters (known values, config file, user input...)
        See Also:
        MetaValue.MetaValue(String, wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy, String)

      • BooleanSetSingle

                        java.lang.String shortDescription,

                        boolean initValue)
        Parameters:
        fileNamePostfix - The short human readable title, used as a postfix in conf files (e.g. for use as dialog box title)
        shortDescription - The short description (key) of the unique attribute to create in the configuration
        initValue - The Initial value of the parameter with type boolean
        retrievalPolicy - The policy to retrieve the parameters (known values, config file, user input...)
        See Also:
        MetaValue.MetaValue(String, wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy, String)

      • BooleanSetSingle

        public BooleanSetSingle(java.lang.String fileNamePostfix,
                        java.lang.String shortDescription,
                        MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy retrievalPolicy,
                        java.lang.String subdir)
        Creates a BooleanValueConfig with initial value zero.
        Parameters:
        fileNamePostfix - The short human readable title, used as a postfix in conf files (e.g. for use as dialog box title)
        shortDescription - The short description (key) of the unique attribute to create in the configuration
        retrievalPolicy - The policy to retrieve the parameters (known values, config file, user input...)
        subdir - Sub-directory of the default gobal directory in which the default global metadata file should be looked for.
        See Also:
        MetaValue.MetaValue(String, wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy, String)

      • BooleanSetSingle

        public BooleanSetSingle(java.lang.String fileNamePostfix,
                        java.lang.String shortDescription,
                        MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy retrievalPolicy,
                        boolean initValue,
                        java.lang.String subdir)
        Parameters:
        fileNamePostfix - The short human readable title, used as a postfix in conf files (e.g. for use as dialog box title)
        shortDescription - The short description (key) of the unique attribute to create in the configuration
        initValue - The Initial value of the parameter with type boolean
        retrievalPolicy - The policy to retrieve the parameters (known values, config file, user input...)
        subdir - Sub-directory of the default gobal directory in which the default global metadata file should be looked for.
        See Also:
        MetaValue.MetaValue(String, wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy, String)

      • retrieveConfigsUsingPolicies

        public void retrieveConfigsUsingPolicies(java.lang.String guessDir,
                                         java.lang.String dialogTitle)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Allows to retrieve all parameters in a collection of metadata contents, each according to its policy.
        Parameters:
        guessDir - A temptative directory where to seek first for the metadata
        dialogTitle - Title for the dialog box, if any, that prompts the user for data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of file read error
